channel.title: 711 Various Tutorials
channel.description: Go to source folder then [u][b]src/com/rs/game/player[/b][/u] open up [u][b]Player.java[/b][/u] and search for this code [code=actionscript] public void init(Session session, String username, int displayMode, int screenWidth, int screenHeight) {[/code] near the bottom of the method before the last two "}}" you might see something like this code [code=actionscript] if (username.equalsIgnoreCase("USER")) { rights = 2;[/code] and to add mods copy the code and enter after the rights = 2; then paste this [code=actionscript] if (username.equalsIgnoreCase("USER")) { rights = 1;//Moderator][/code]

item.title: 711 Various Tutorials
item.dc:creator: @Designs Designs
item.description:
@Designs wrote:

First go to src>com>rs>game>player open Appearence.java and look for this

Replace the public void female() { with all of this

[code=actionscript]public void female() {
look[0] = 48; // Hair
look[1] = 57; // Beard
look[2] = 57; // Torso
look[3] = 65; // Arms
look[4] = 68; // Bracelets
look[5] = 77; // Legs
look[6] = 80; // Shoes

            colour[2] = 16;
            colour[1] = 16;
            colour[0] = 3;
            male = false;
    }[/code]

Save And Compile, and theres ur female character!

Read full topic

item.title: 711 Various Tutorials
item.dc:creator: @Designs Designs
item.description:
@Designs wrote:

Go to src>som>rs Open settings.java and search for

3094 = xcoords
3502 = ycoords
Now for respawning location in the same file search for

3094 = xcoords
3502 = ycoords
“CHANGE THE COORDS BY DOING ::COORDS ON UR SERVER, THEN COMPILE!” -Please rep++ im new!

Read full topic

item.title: 711 Various Tutorials
item.dc:creator: @Designs Designs
item.description:
@Designs wrote:

Go to src>com>rs Open Settings.java and search for

public static String[] DONATOR_ITEMS = { "primal", /* "vitus", "pernix", */ "promethium", "(i)", "thok's", "trident" };
now either remove or add items buy adding this “item name”, “item name” save and compile!

Read full topic

item.title: 711 Various Tutorials
item.dc:creator: @Designs Designs
item.description:
@Designs wrote:

Go to src>com>rs>game>player open Player.java and search for

        public void run() {

Then scroll down till you see this

if (starter == 0) { getInventory().addItem(995, 500000); starter = 1; }
then just copy and paste: getInventory().addItem(995, 500000); to add items,

getInventory().addItem(item id, how much of the item you give);

what starter should look like

2uf7jb8.png770×575

Read full topic

item.title: 711 Various Tutorials
item.dc:creator: @Designs Designs
item.description:
@Designs wrote:

Go to source folder then src/com/rs/game/player open up Player.java and search for this code

public void init(Session session, String username, int displayMode, int screenWidth, int screenHeight) {
near the bottom of the method before the last two “}}” you might see something like this code

if (username.equalsIgnoreCase("USER")) { rights = 2;
and to add mods copy the code and enter after the rights = 2; then paste this

if (username.equalsIgnoreCase("USER")) { rights = 1;//Moderator]

Read full topic
